notice.ch: 理學院學士班修課要以化學領域組別

remark.ch: 理學院學士班修課要以化學領域組別

goal.en: An introduction to the principles of chemistry.

outline.ch: The topics include 1. Introduction 2. Atoms, Molecules and Ions. 3. Stoichiometry. 4. Chemical Reactions and Solution Stoichmetry. 5. Gases. 6. Chemical Equilibrium. 7. Acids and Bases. 8. Applications of Aqueous Equilibra. Ch 15, (Kinetics Chemistry).
outline.en: The topics include 1. Introduction 2. Atoms, Molecules and Ions. 3. Stoichiometry. 4. Chemical Reactions and Solution Stoichmetry. 5. Gases. 6. Chemical Equilibrium. 7. Acids and Bases. 8. Applications of Aqueous Equilibra. Ch 15, (Kinetics Chemistry).

textbook.ch: “Chemical Principles, 8th edition Ed. Steven S. Zumdahl“
textbook.en: “Chemical Principles, 8th edition Ed. Steven S. Zumdahl“

gradMethod.ch:
“小考 10％ (不定期)
Midterm I 45％ (Chapter 2-5 or 6)
Final Exam 45％ (Chapter 6, 7, 8, and 15)
Might adjust the weighting ratio, will announce in Class. 
(保留這三個比重之調整權)“
gradMethod.en:
Quiz 10％
Midterm I 45％ (Chapter 2-5 or 6)
Final Exam 45％ (Chapter 6, 7, 8, and 15)
Might adjust the weighting ratio, will announce in Class.

officeHour.ch: 每週三的下午五點～七點

ch.competencies: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
養成協調與領導的能力

en.competencies: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership
